ExecutableTestSuite.label: Monitoring Requirements for INSPIRE metadata TEST
ExecutableTestSuite.description:
This test suite examines metadata records against the requirements for metadata in INSPIRE.

This is a draft version. It has limitations and is expected to contain errors. Please report any issues or problems in GitHub.

Known limitations are documented in the description of the applicable test case or test assertion.

There is a general limitation in all assertions that polymorphism and containment by reference (see the Technical Guidance, sub-clauses A.3, A.4 and A.5) are not supported. However, the current Abstract Test Suite does not support polymorphism and references either (all XPath expressions do not support polymorhism or references; in addition, schema validation is only executed against the ISO/OGC schemas without extensions). It is therefore unclear if this is really a limitation or if the sections in the technical guidance are outdated.

Source: Conformance Class 7: 'INSPIRE Harmonised Spatial Data Services metadata'

Pre-requisite conformance classes: Conformance Class 6
ExecutableTestSuite.author: Consortium Bilbomatica, Guadaltel y Geograma

ParameterList.name: ETF Standard Parameters for metadata XML test objects

TestCase.label: Identification
TestCase.description: Execute tests that apply for harmonised metadata records on elements that are child elements of the section of the XML document: Identification Info (property of the gmd:MD_Metadata element). This section contains information specific to the harmonised services.

TestAssertion.label: M.1: Spatial scope code list
TestAssertion.description:
Test that the invocation metadata for the Spatial Data Harmonized Services is provided.

More information: Invocation Metadata
TestAssertion.expression: let $messages := (for $record in $records let $rid := $record/gmd:fileIdentifier/*/text() let $descriptiveKeywords := if ($record/gmd:hierarchyLevel/gmd:MD_ScopeCode/@codeListValue = 'service') then $record/gmd:identificationInfo/srv:SV_ServiceIdentification/gmd:descriptiveKeywords else $record/gmd:identificationInfo/gmd:MD_DataIdentification/gmd:descriptiveKeywords let $keywordsAnchor := for $x in $descriptiveKeywords/gmd:MD_Keywords/gmd:keyword/gmx:Anchor where ($x/@xlink:href = 'http://inspire.ec.europa.eu/metadata-codelist/SpatialScope/european' or $x/@xlink:href = 'http://inspire.ec.europa.eu/metadata-codelist/SpatialScope/global' or $x/@xlink:href = 'http://inspire.ec.europa.eu/metadata-codelist/SpatialScope/local' or $x/@xlink:href = 'http://inspire.ec.europa.eu/metadata-codelist/SpatialScope/national' or $x/@xlink:href = 'http://inspire.ec.europa.eu/metadata-codelist/SpatialScope/regional') return $x let $keywordsCharacterString := for $x in $descriptiveKeywords/gmd:MD_Keywords/gmd:keyword/gco:CharacterString where ($x = 'European' or $x = 'Global' or $x = 'Local' or $x = 'National' or $x = 'Regional') return $x let $thesaurusNameTitle := if ($record/gmd:hierarchyLevel/gmd:MD_ScopeCode/@codeListValue = 'service') then $record/gmd:identificationInfo/srv:SV_ServiceIdentification/gmd:descriptiveKeywords/gmd:MD_Keywords/gmd:thesaurusName/gmd:CI_Citation/gmd:title else $record/gmd:identificationInfo/gmd:MD_DataIdentification/gmd:descriptiveKeywords/gmd:MD_Keywords/gmd:thesaurusName/gmd:CI_Citation/gmd:title let $validThesaurusNameTitle := for $x in $thesaurusNameTitle where ($x = 'Spatial scope' or $x/gmx:Anchor/@xlink:href = 'http://inspire.ec.europa.eu/metadata-codelist/SpatialScope') return $x return if (count($keywordsAnchor) = 0 and count($keywordsCharacterString) = 0) then local:addMessage('TR.spatialScopeCodeListMissing', map { 'filename': local:filename($record), 'id': $rid }) else if (count($validThesaurusNameTitle) = 0) then local:addMessage('TR.spatialScopeCitationMissing', map { 'filename': local:filename($record), 'id': $rid }) else() )[position() le $limitErrors] return (if ($messages) then 'FAILED' else 'PASSED', local:error-statistics('TR.recordsWithErrors', count(fn:distinct-values($messages//etf:argument[@token='id']/text()))), $messages)
